title: Assess Hail Damage Using Drone Imagery
description: After a hailstorm, an insurance adjuster uses a drone to assess the percentage of crop damage in a field.

tasks.description: Process high-resolution drone imagery of the damaged field.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-resolution map of the field.

tasks.description: Analyze the imagery to identify damaged plants and quantify the area of severe damage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's analysis shows that 35% of the field has suffered significant defoliation.

tasks.description: Generate a report for the insurance claim, including the damage percentage and a map highlighting the affected areas.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a formal report suitable for an insurance claim.
